note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Share of calories from cereals, roots, and tubers vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: A high share of calories from cereals, roots and tubers typically represents lower dietary diversity. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Calories from cereals, roots and tubers
